content:
Reference:
https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/carin-bb/StructureDefinition-CARIN-BB-ExplanationOfBenefit-Pharmacy.html

For Pharmacy EOB implementation, if we use

  1. CARIN BB EOB profile and
  2. the Base FHIR Patient resource
    in the bundle, is the API will be FHIR compliant?
FHIR compliant yes, CARIN BB compliant maybe not because patients should comply with the CARIN BB patient profile: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/carin-bb/StructureDefinition-CARIN-BB-Patient.html
